titleInfo.title: Addressing Multiple Participants: A Museum Robot's Gaze Shapes Visitor Participation

mods.abstract: Using videorecordings from a real-world field study with a museum guide robot, we show procedures by which the robot manages (i) to include and (ii) to disengage users in a multi-party situation.
